website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful, delicious, healthy recipes. List of foods to keep in your pantry is a nice bonus.
pros: This cookbook offers over 100 delicious, flavorful Mediterranean diet recipes you can make in 30 minutes or less
Written by 2 registered dietitians, who really know their stuff
cons: Several people wished for many more pictures than are included

customer_reviews.title: Many delicious recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I am a physician, and I often recommend a Mediterranean diet to my patients for reducing cholesterol, losing weight, managing diabetes, and reducing cancer risk. This book gives me an easy resource to suggest to my patients who want ideas on delicious, quick and healthy recipes. I loved the honey-rosemary almonds as a delicious snack (by themselves or with a cocktail), pastina chicken soup with kale for warming comfort food on a chilly night, roasted broccoli panzanella salad as a hearty, satisfying yet healthy starter, and roasted red pepper chicken with hummus for a seemingly fancy yet easy and delicious dinner. There are lots of vegetarian and gluten free recipes, also delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Joan McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Great value, and great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t stop trying things from this book! The recipes are easy and very adaptable for special dietary needs and tastes. One thing I love is that because the recipes are uncomplicated, making a recipe the second time can almost be done from memory which saves even more time. Lastly, I personally hate the word diet. Don’t think that you are buying a diet book if you buy this one-it’s just a healthy way to eat, which is what we should be doing everyday anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Fetterolf

customer_reviews.title: ... is following the Mediterranean diet and these recipes are easy to follow without a lot of complicated steps or ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is following the Mediterranean diet and these recipes are easy to follow without a lot of complicated steps or fuss. I don't like to cook but the recipes are easy enough that I could make them
customer_reviews.author: peggy k Ward

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, Delicious, Easy to Make Recipies
customer_reviews.text: What is not to LOVE? This book is filled with easy to prepare recipies made with real, easy to find ingredients. The highly credentialed authors have written the book in a friendly, conversational manner. I made a few of the recipies for a recent party- photos included. They were all hits— but my favorite was the dill salmon wraps. This is a great cookbook that I am sure I will refer back regularly for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Not one picture
customer_reviews.text: How do you have a cook book with not one picture???
customer_reviews.author: TeamWash

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok not what I expected but I’m a visual person and this didn’t have pictures of the finished recipe
customer_reviews.author: Justme

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: The book I downloaded was missing photos of any of the dishes and a good bit of parts to the recipes, they simply were not viewable. If a better version is available to replace what I paid for; then I would be happy to re do my review.
customer_reviews.author: Woody Fingers

customer_reviews.title: New to the Mediterranean diet?  This is a great beginner's cookbook
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best cookbooks I've ever purchased. I am new to the Mediterranean diet. I chose it because of the many positive reviews its received. The recipes are easy to follow, logical and delicious. I've made 6 of the recipes and my family has been singing my praises.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Super cookbook! The recipes are easy and truly quick. I have been making them for my family with 6 kids, and they all CLEAN their plates and want more! They get super excited if they know that I am making a recipe out of here for dinner that night! The only thing I wish it had was some sample menus, or ideas of what to pair each recipe with, as I am new to the Mediterranean diet and am not really sure how to make a healthy menu for it. Other than that it is great! So far we have liked every recipe that I have tried!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Caswell

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and healthy
customer_reviews.text: Love this cookbook if you like simple ingredients and easy to follow recipes. They are healthy and quick to cook!
customer_reviews.author: Softail75

customer_reviews.title: The recipes are not accurate
customer_reviews.text: It takes longer to make the recipe. They make it sound easier than it is to cook the recipe. They said it was the best recipe in the book and it was pretty lousy. Could have used less potatoes and other vegetables instead. Only good thing about it was the sauce and the chicken. Afraid to use any of the other recipes.
customer_reviews.author: scallywag

customer_reviews.title: No pictures???
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe the lack of pictures in this book. How are you supposed to know what the dish is supposed to look like?
customer_reviews.author: Meekspirit1

customer_reviews.title: Recipes that you can really cook
customer_reviews.text: I have made several recipes from this book already, and all are excellent. There are ideas for substituting ingredients, which were really helpful as I don't live where lots of seafood or specialty items are readily available. Recipes are simple, with clear directions that don't require odd cooking equipment, but rather use things most of us have one hand I would give this as a gift to someone just starting to cook as well as someone wishing to try to eat more healthy foods. Note: it is not a "diet" in the sense of touting weight loss , etc.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: My go to cookbook!!
customer_reviews.text: I have already recommended this cookbook to two others! Love it so much! Cooking for one is tough but with this cookbook, the female doctors that wrote it took into consideration that not everyone wants to buy new ingredients for every recipe. I can make lots of recipes and I don’t waste any ingredients! Tasty recipes too! Give this one a try and I bet you will be super pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie McAllister

customer_reviews.title: A good tool to inspire healthy eating
customer_reviews.text: I like how the book includes a list of some of the ingredients you will need to make many of the recipes (i.e. olive oil, balsamic vinegar, etc.). I also like the variety of dish categories like chicken dishes, vegetable dishes, and desserts. I don’t see many recipes I plan to follow exactly, but there is enough to work with so I can still get a good bit of inspiration to make my own variation of Mediterranean-style dishes. It would be nice if there were a few more pictures of the completed recipes so I’ll know what the finished product should look like :-D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ohhhh. The author is a dietician.
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients are healthy but the plates lack taste, texture, and visual appeal. I just realized that the author is a dietician, so guess that first sentence makes sense. Next time maybe I should buy my cookbook from a chef?
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Nothing new or interesting in this book, only repetition of well known recipes; no original contributions
customer_reviews.author: Highlander37

customer_reviews.title: No pictures. Decent but not outstanding recipes.
customer_reviews.text: Eh...I was disappointed to find that there isn’t a single picture of the recipes. What I’ve made so far has been the start of a good recipe. I’ve had to add my own herbs and spice to make it flavorful. It’s full of good idea, but I would not have bought it if I had known there were no pictures.
customer_reviews.author: by Beth

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: Not ONE recipe was simple or clear or easy enough to consider doing this diet.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi O'Hare

customer_reviews.title: Great cook book
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to just eat healthier. Not looking to lose weight but just to eat good and tasty food. I have tried about 6 recipes so far. They are very easy to make, products are readily available and don't take hours to make The big plus, they taste good. I have a ton of cookbooks, but I have been trying to work on this one and I am enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: golfereen

customer_reviews.title: Very Basic
customer_reviews.text: I try not to be negative about a book. Many people put a lot of work into them. This one however has quite a few issues. First, the content is very basic. You could easily google much more specific information about following the Mediterranean style of eating in just moments. Also, some of the recipes are so simple it is absurd. They have a recipe for a fruit, veggie, and cheese board. The recipe lists washing and cutting the veggies, fruits, and cheeses and placing on a board. Many of the recipes in this book follow suit with just the most basic information, using similar ingredients. I guess I just expected more from a book that was so highly rated.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: love these meals in 30 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: love this book - we've made several meals already every one has been delicious and inside the 30 minute mark - great for cooking after work without waiting 2 hours to eat! easy prep and lots of ingredients are fairly common in the kitchen so not alot of extra shopping for us
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: No recipe photos
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to make any of the recipes yet, but was disappointed to see that there aren't any photos with the recipes. Well, there's one photo at the beginning of each chapter...just enough to get you excited about food photography before you realize that it's just a tease. I gave three stars because everything else looks nice and well-written. The lack of photos is disappointing, though.
customer_reviews.author: gingersnap

customer_reviews.title: A great start to the Mediterranean diet and tasty
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book. It explains the pyramid of the Mediterranean diet and has very easy recipes to follow. It also gives substitutions which is great. I have found that the key to this type of cooking is to prep a lot of your ingredients ahead as most of these recipes cook quickly. Some of the recipes are similar to another book I have but these are just a bit different and every bit as yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Aikey

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I have made three or four recipes out of this so far, but I have tagged many more to make. The recipes really are fast enough to make on a weeknight, and they're healthy and easy. I made the cod stew (super easy) and my husband said it was the best thing I've ever made (we've been together ten years). I wanted to expand my repertoire and make healthier dishes incorporating more fish and veggies, and that's just what this offers.
customer_reviews.author: publish or perish

customer_reviews.title: Good recipes, good instructions
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are fairly easy to make recipes, fast, and tasty. There is nutritional information at the end, which is helpful. There are recipes here that I've never seen anywhere else. I already have a number of favorites that I make often. Some recipes call for quick versions of grains, but they can be adapted for the long-cooking grains, and just take longer to make. I also like that there isn't a need to dirty a whole pile of pots and pans to make these recipes, or to buy esoteric ingredients, either. There are a few of those, but not many, really.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Kindwoman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Easy Recipes, Especially for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to the Mediterranean healthy way of eating, so I was looking for a book with recipes that were relatively easy and didn't take a lot of time to prepare and cook. I like this book very much! It's exactly what I was looking for. The recipes state complete nutrition info, plus if they are dairy-free, gluten-free,egg-free, 5 ingredients, one pot, etc. The chapters include recipes for Breakfast; Salads and Soups; Small Plates and Snacks; Beans, Rice and Grain; Sandwiches and Wraps; Pizza and Pasta; Fish add Seafood; Chicken; Meat; Veggies; and Desserts. The salmon recipes and peach-glazed chicken drummies recipe (I used chicken strips instead of drummies) are excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Ross

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: Great recipes! I thought It was redundant in the use of vegetables. As I read further, the book suggested the use of in season vegetables. That opened up many possibilities for me. The recipes come from a various places in the Mediterranean. Nice cookbook!
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Taste

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes and pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow recipes with great pictures Hoping it will help with cholesterol and diabetes.
customer_reviews.author: EastOreMom

customer_reviews.title: Good cookbook, but there are better ones
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered a couple cookbooks recently, and this one (although very good) is my least favorite. The meals in the book are ok, nothing very creative or inspiring. And the worst part is that there are hardly any pictures. It’s so hard to pick what to make when you’re not drooling over the picture first!
customer_reviews.author: ZachT

customer_reviews.title: Choices to eat healthier.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cookbook for those of us wishing to eat better and wishing for information on Mediterranean options. The recipes truly are prepared in half an hour or less. The authors correctly claim Mediterranean is not a strict diet, but can be a life style changer. Each of the recipes I tried was easy to follow and came out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JMAlexandria

customer_reviews.title: Great Cook book!
customer_reviews.text: I hate cooking but love Mediterranean food. I’ve tried one recipe so far and loved how quick, easy and flavorful it was. Looking forward to trying more
customer_reviews.author: JD Mason

customer_reviews.title: Really great diet
customer_reviews.text: This diet is great, I started this diet the week before thanksgiving so far lost 100 pounds , dropped 12 sizes and feeling great , almost off all medicine, I’ve had A FIB for over 15 years it’s almost gone , I’m in the best health in over 20 years and love the diet , try it it works
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite Mediterranean cookbooks
customer_reviews.text: This book has become my go-to cookbook for a variety of dishes. Ease of preparation and fast cooking time are the main reasons, besides delicious food every recipe! A real winner has got to be my new favorite way of eating tuna salad sandwichs. Thank you Deanna and Serena for this book, and I'll buy your next!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Larrabee

customer_reviews.title: 30 minutes or less prep time
customer_reviews.text: Have made several recipes and all were good. It explains the Mediterranean diet plan and way to eat. I started reading labels and was surprised to realize how much salt and sugar are added to all our foods. I cleaned the pantry out and donated food. I have lost 12 lbs since lowering my salt and sugar content. Recommend whole grains and beans. Used to feel hungry between meals and now am not. I grab 1/4 cup of nuts as recommended. Eat vegetables 2 times a week and fish 2 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Tasty meal ideas
customer_reviews.text: The intro is very well written and clear on the goals of these recipes. Everything we have tried has been unexpected good, even if we weren't sure, so it's added a nice change to our meal plans with inventive ways to have vegetables and sometimes fish or chicken. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Terra E. Whitmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps there are some people that will find this book appealing, I returned it as soon as it was delivered. I understand that the book is about preparing quick meals but they lacked imagination in my opinion. I found another book equivalent to this with better pictures and more imaginative recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Most of the recipes aren’t that easy to make. The ingredients are not something I typically have in my home nor are some of them readily available. Next to no pictures regarding the finished dish. I like each recipe showing the finished product. However, this book only shows one picture at the beginning of each chapter. Although I will not return it, I wish I hadn’t bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Get it! Great, easy dishes
customer_reviews.text: New to this way of eating and the combination of spices but have always loved going out to a Mediterranean restaurant for dinner on occasion. New year, new me has me trying new flavors and so far I’ve made 6 of the recipes in this and each was incredible.
customer_reviews.author: jugglingitall

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This little cookbook has been easy and convenient to use. The recipes have been tasty, and the ingredients are easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Interesting.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for something great. I didn't learn anything new. If you don't have any Mediterranean recipes then this book will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: kathy l. spealman

customer_reviews.title: Book fell apart first time using.
customer_reviews.text: The glue for the binding did not hold. The first time I used it, the pages started falling out. I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Not enough pictures. Wish i had spent more and gotten another cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: linda walkup

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL recipes
customer_reviews.text: I started marking the recipes that I wanted to make, and ended up marking most of the book! These recipes are so yummy and actually very easy to make. I love this cookbook!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great Recipes!
customer_reviews.text: This book really helped us tap into cooking Mediterranean style. We love the Lemon-Garlic Hummus, the Red Pepper Hummus Chicken, and the Triple Green Pasta (we add sun-dried tomatoes - yum!). These are staples in our weekly diet. Like with most cookbooks, there's a bunch of recipes we'll probably never make, but the ones we have were all delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine V.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as reviews say, returning it.
customer_reviews.text: Sigh, I wanted to love it. But there are no pictures and visuals are important to my interest in recipes. Also I'm not familiar with a lot of the ingredients or recipes and so it was hard to be interested in them. So I'm returning it :(
customer_reviews.author: cksefton987

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to start learning the Mediterranean diet, but not having much knowledge of it was a bit intimidating. This book has been great so far, with simple recipes that do not require a mile-long list of ingredients. I never knew you could make hummus with peanut butter!
customer_reviews.author: Ss

customer_reviews.title: Needs more pictures
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the information about the Mediterranean lifestyle and kitchen staples at the beginning of the cookbook. Many recipes may take longer than stated unless you prep in advance, have a helper, or buy ingredients already prepped. I like to shop on Saturday and do all prepping and roasting on Sunday. Then it's just assembling healthy meals throughout the week. This cookbook makes that easy. I also enjoy the tips and alternate options written for each recipe. Just giving 4 stars as I wish there were pictures for each recipe instead of just 1 per chapter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I grew up in a Greek family so having these recipes set out in this manner is awesome. I love the recipes and the plans. You will too!
customer_reviews.author: ALANA M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Recipes
customer_reviews.text: Great book! I'm not the best of cooks, but the recipes are not at all difficult and are usually easy to cut if half. I've made several recipes and even my husband, who's typically a meat-and-potatoes guy, likes them! I especially appreciate the authors' information on ingredients, tips for substitutions and good humor!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, but delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I hate to cook, but this book gave me motivation to do so. The recipes I have prepared have been easy, delicious, and healthy. I have been so impressed with the book that I have given several as gifts. If you buy one healthy cookbook, this should be the one.
customer_reviews.author: Berkshire Girl

customer_reviews.title: Tried but family didn't go for it.
customer_reviews.text: Tried several of the recipes but the family wouldn't go for it. I loved the dishes but the family is more meat and potatoes and turned their noses up. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: The book has a lot of pages but they are not the easiest to understand and the recipes are not the most user friendly but there is some good information
customer_reviews.author: Kay Engle

customer_reviews.title: Too many ingredients needed
customer_reviews.text: Too many ingredients. Not likely to try any of the recipes
customer_reviews.author: dolores..

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love my new cookbook. My doctor suggested I go on the Mediterranean diet/food because of the health benefits and this book is amazing. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rakestraw

customer_reviews.title: 4star
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased! Just thumbed through it. So, happy with the content. Haven’t tried any recipes yet but read a few. Looking forward to exploring more. Definitely 4star in my honest opinion.
customer_reviews.author: J Stinson

customer_reviews.title: A diet for life!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this book! I’m looking forward to trying a good portion of the meals. I really find the Mediterranean diet interesting. I hope I can do this for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: We have found this to be very helpful and my wife loves fixing use different meals each night and at the same time we have been able to loose weight...
customer_reviews.author: John Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the layout of the book and the recipes were unappetizing. I can't see myself using this cookbook. Boo!
customer_reviews.author: February Jones

customer_reviews.title: No pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should look for fully illustrated when looking for cookbooks. :( Without the picture, it's sometimes tough to determine if you want to make a recipe or not. Most great cookbooks come fully illustrated!
customer_reviews.author: janice m graham

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy and delicious dishes!
customer_reviews.text: I love the divisions within the book and the simplicity of the recipes. Everything I have tried so far has been delicious! I hope they will team up for another cookbook soon!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Folks

customer_reviews.title: Change your way of life!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as gifts for sister, daughter and self. We all three are cooking these recipes, sharing results, shopping together, sharing a meal occasionally. Thanks for all the fun we are having learning to live better.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Family friendly, heathy and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: The recipes in this cookbook are fresh, healthy and easy to follow (and delicious! ) I’ve made several of them and my whole family really liked them. In particular we loved the baked chicken caprese and Moroccan meatballs. I’m looking forward to working my way through this cookbook!!
customer_reviews.author: tracey flood

customer_reviews.title: cooking on a diet or health
customer_reviews.text: very easy to read the recipes and food is very tasty. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: No pictures
customer_reviews.text: Recipes are good, but I really like to see presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Jean E Field

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a plain cookbook. I need visualization in my cookbooks, this one has few pictures. Recipes really didn't differ from any other Mediterranean cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great meal ideas. One drawback is the amount of ingredients in most of them however you can modify them too so it works for us!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Food Easily
customer_reviews.text: First off, I hate cooking, but love to eat. These recipes are easy to make and full of flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this book. I am changing my wating habit to be healthier, this fits the bill. Easy to follow and grat recipes. You can't go wrong with this book.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Flavor
customer_reviews.text: The recipes are great, there is something for everyone. I can't wait to try these! Especially the brownies, and the pork recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah DeCarlo

customer_reviews.title: Ok not great
customer_reviews.text: Good enough. I wish there were pictures. The recipes are good but it isn’t fun to read. It’s more of a resource to complement other books.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Fast and Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly enjoying this cookbook and have been making several recipes a week. Truly 30 min.or under and not a lot of ingredients. I am so glad I chose this for my first Mediterranean cookbook. It has been the perfect introduction to this style of cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy recipes!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift but looked like good recipes, should’ve got one myself!
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Quite appropriate, particularly if you have limited time
customer_reviews.text: Handy for a beginner, clear and quite appropriate to use when timing is a constraint...ah...and when you follow the recipes +or - “precisely” the resulting meal tyrns out to be delicious and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to find recipes
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was an index or table of contents to make finding reciepie easier
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: not ture !
customer_reviews.text: I made a few of the recipes out of here , and they took much longre then 30 mins to make , and they are very costly to make due to the healthy ingrendents used to make them, I made 4 different recipes , and 1 out of the 4 was worth eating , and that was dark chocolate cherrier brownies
customer_reviews.author: wondering

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of good, healthy recipes. Having a great time trying them.
customer_reviews.author: Possum Lady

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, easy to follow, and amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This book is so awesome and easy to follow! The recipes are so yummy and easy to make fresh. This is my go to book!
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Some yummy recipes
customer_reviews.text: I'm just getting into cooking more Mediterranean type food and this book has easy to follow recipes.
customer_reviews.author: JM in OH

customer_reviews.title: Good cookbook
customer_reviews.text: A very helpful cookbook for anyone either already on or contemplating the Mediterranean diet
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Food is good
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had more photos but the recepies we have cooked taste great. Healthy and useable.
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes!
customer_reviews.text: If you're planning on eating healthy, this book is for you!
customer_reviews.author: RayK

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had passed on this
customer_reviews.text: Browsed through the book. Not what I was expecting. Doubtful i will make any of these recipes.
customer_reviews.author: CatRene

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of yummy recipes! And I live that they’re all easy and quick! I just wish it had a few more pictures.
customer_reviews.author: TC James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cookbook. Every recipe I have tried was quick, easy and delicious!
customer_reviews.author: KHH

customer_reviews.title: Love this cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Love the cookbook. Easy and fast recipes. Taste meals for the family.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Good beginning book
customer_reviews.text: The book has wonderful recipes. I just wish there were more pictures.
customer_reviews.author: jimmersgal

customer_reviews.title: Mmm good.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of good sounding recipes that I would like to try. I wish there were more photographs of the food, however.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Quick & Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cookbook. The recipes are tasty and give tips for alternative ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: PattyGator

customer_reviews.title: Healthy recipes
customer_reviews.text: Quick, healthy recipes as we embark on the Mediterranean diet.
customer_reviews.author: Panama Red

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, Easy and Great Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had a dinner yet that we haven't loved. Every night we have something new. Anyone can make a great meal by just following the recipe's. Since it's just the 2 of us, we cut some of the recipe's in half unless we want leftovers for another night. Be creative! Add other tasty veggies, pasta or rice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Walton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Basic Recipes
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for shortcuts to boil down time-consuming, great Mediterranean recipes to 30 minutes from start to finish. This book has just basic recipes that don't require a cookbook to describe.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Brucato

customer_reviews.title: Terrific recipes
customer_reviews.text: Simple but delicious recipes. Clear, easy to follow directions. Love it
customer_reviews.author: gramn

customer_reviews.title: good recipes
customer_reviews.text: I only used a couple of recipes but were good. I did not continue with this diet
customer_reviews.author: beesting

customer_reviews.title: No Pictures
customer_reviews.text: There are only about 10 pictures in this whole book, not good. I like to see how recipe is supposed to look.
customer_reviews.author: C Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn't turn out to be what I liked. Going to turn a keto recipe book instead
customer_reviews.author: Amber Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fast, healthy and delicious- trifecta!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I’ve tried so far has been delicious and healthy. The prep and cooking times are actually accurate for once!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Mediterranean diet
customer_reviews.text: Good recipes. Thought it was the mind diet not Mediterranean diet. But they are very simaler.
customer_reviews.author: jujo

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this cooobook, but after cooking 30 recipes from it, we only really liked 2. We probably won't be using it moving forward:(
customer_reviews.author: E. Elena

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes!
customer_reviews.text: Reviewed quite a few cookbooks, & I'm glad I went with this one. I've made a few recipes so far,& all are easy & delicious..definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
